name: Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis: The Action Game
name_original: Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis: The Action Game
description:
Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis: The Action Game is an arcade game developed by LucasArts Entertainment. It came out on 01-01-1992. LucasArts Entertainment published the game.
Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis: The Action Game is available on PC.
Shelley Day produced the game. Hal Barwood directed the game. It was scored by Clint Bajakian, Michael Land and Peter McConnell.
